Package tools

Class ImageTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.ImageTools
  • @Deprecated
public class ImageTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Deprecated.
    old class. Implementations are slow and might be broken.
    Provides easy tool functions for images.

    This class is currently under development.
    Do not use this class, or use with care and check runtimes!

    • Method Detail

      • simpleAction

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage simpleAction​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage biIn,
                                                        ImageTools.SimpleAction rotationType)
        Deprecated.
        Manipulates an image in a simple way. Actions are:
        • rotate 90 degrees right
        • rotate 90 degrees left
        • rotate 180 degrees
        • mirror on the vertical axis
        • mirror on the horizontal axis
        • mirror on the diagonal (type 1) from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner
        • mirror on the diagonal (type 2) from the lower-left corner to the upper-right corner

      • rotateImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotateImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage biIn,
                                                       double angle,
                                                       int type)
        Deprecated.
        Turns an image over an angle. The angle is in radians! Use Math.toRadians(double deg) for conversions.
        Parameters:
        biIn - image on which the rotation has to be used on.
        angle - the angle on radians the image has to be rotated over.
        type - denotes the algorithm used. Must be one of:
        • AffineTransformOp.TYPE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOR
        • AffineTransformOp.TYPE_BILINEAR
        • AffineTransformOp.TYPE_BICUBIC
        Returns:
        a new BufferedImage containing the rotated image of biIn without corner-loss. The size of the image depends both on the size of the biIn and the angle.

      • toBufferedImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage toBufferedImage​(java.awt.Image img)
        Deprecated.
        Converts an Image object to an BufferedImage object in a resource efficient way.
        Parameters:
        img - the image to be converted.
        Returns:
        the converted image.
        See Also:
        for more info on return value.

      • toBufferedImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage toBufferedImage​(java.awt.Image img,
                                                           int type)
        Deprecated.
        Converts an Image object to an BufferedImage object in a resource efficient way.
        Parameters:
        img - the image to be converted
        type - the new image type iff a new BufferedImage object is created.
        Returns:
        • null if img == null
        • img if img instanceof BufferedImage
        • A new BufferedImage containing the image of img generated by imageDeepCopy(Image, int)
        See Also:
        imageDeepCopy(Image, int)

      • imageDeepCopy

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageDeepCopy​(java.awt.Image source)
        Deprecated.
        Makes a deep copy of an image.
        Parameters:
        source - the image to be converted.
        Returns:
        a new BufferedImage from the source.

      • imageDeepCopy

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageDeepCopy​(java.awt.Image source,
                                                         int type)
        Deprecated.
        Makes a deep copy of an image. Use this to ensure that the given Image object is a new instance. Note that source != imageDeepCopy(source) always holds.
        Parameters:
        source - the image to be converted
        type - the type of the new BufferedImage
        Returns:
        a new BufferedImage of the source
